products.title: Dem Thangs Sweet Thang 60ml Vape Juice
products.description: Sweet Thang 60ml Vape Juice - Dem Thangs by Prohibition Juice Co.Sweet Thang: Discover your new favorite Sweet Thang with this decadent e-liquid from the Dem Thangs line by Prohibition Juice Co. Sweet Thang starts off with a rich, buttery cupcake layered with scrumptious hazelnut creme. With your exhale, you’ll find a drizzle of sweet caramel and a touch of aromatic coffee. It’s the sweet treat you’ve been craving!Features & Specifications:Size: 60mlPG/VG: 75/25Nicotine: 0mg, 3mg, 6mgFlavor Profile: Cupcake, Hazelnut Creme, Dessert

products.title: Dem Thangs These Thangs Happen 60ml Vape Juice
products.description: These Thangs Happen 60ml Vape Juice - Dem Thangs by Prohibition Juice Co.These Thangs Happen: These Thangs Happen by Prohibition Juice Co. blends juicy blueberries with whole milk and vanilla ice cream to make a creamy dessert vape that exceeds expectations! The richness of the milkshake and the tartness of the blueberries make this a flavor you can fill your tank with again and again.Features & Specifications:Size: 60mlPG/VG: 75/25Nicotine: 0mg, 3mg, 6mgFlavor Profile: Blueberry, Milkshake, Vanilla Creme, Berries

products.title: The Finest Berry Blast 2x 60ml Vape Juice

products.title: Jinx E-liquids - Blueberry & Cherry E-liquid 120ML Shortfill
products.description: Blueberry & CherryThe flavour of sticky sweet and juicy red cherries blended into tart wild blueberries bursting with juiceJinx E-liquids are a brand new range by Six Licks & Wild Roots come in a 70VG/30PG ratio which means they are primarily recommended for sub-ohm vapers.

products.title: Ultimate E-liquid Menthol 100ml Cherry
products.description: Cerezas exquisitamente tiernas mezcladas con mentol para hacer un encantador e-líquido de cereza.10 0 ml de llenado corto, 0 mg de nicotina, 70% VG, 30% PG%, contiene aromas mixtos.
